messages.message:
Connecting

Hi Brian, 

Good afternoon!

I saw your profile here on LinkedIn today and I was hoping we could connect. I saw you're starting to look for new positions, and I thought we could set up a time to discuss your background and what you'd like in your next role.

I actually have a position right now that I think could be a good fit for you, it's a Sr. Architect role, and I'd be happy to discuss it with you.

Lets set up a time to chat, do you have time today? Or, could we set up another time this week?


Thanks!
Russ

Russ Dudas
National Technical Recruiter
Randstad Technologies
781-287-9622
Russ.Dudas@Randstadusa.com
